--- Lynxiz ---

Lynxiz rushes forward, foot long claws extended, bringing herself 
into a battle rage as she prepares to defend her firends and allies. 
"NO," She yells, "I WILL NOT ALLOW YOU TO KILL HER." She 
growls audiable in fury, and slashes twice, once with her right set 
of claws at the preoccupied Depp's shoulder, and slashes again 
with her left arm at Depp's wrist holding the katana. 


On 11 Jul 2001, at 6:29, airly2000@... wrote:

> Termitron/Trinity/Nightlight
> 
> Termitron couldn't avoind Stiller's arrow and it stuck in his leg, but
> he could avoid McGowan's, Virgo's and Alba's attack; after that he
> fired  5 shots against McGowan, 10 against Virgo and 5 against Alba.
> 
> 
> Trinity moved quickly but in inspite of that she was struck by one of
> paralyzing darts, she dificulty could move "I have to help my friends"
> said Trinity "I must help my friends..."
> 
> 
> Nightlight moved quickly and she fired 25 energy-balls against 
Depp
